website_summaries.verdict: The product is well-constructed and does what it claims which is to cinch in the waist and reduce waist size. Good value for your money.
pros: Comes in 2 colors and fits snugly, accentuating the waist
Also features 4 spiral steel bones for support
cons: The sizing is not always as indicated on the sizing chart
if you are deciding between sizes, you should order the larger size

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first because of picture with a skinny girl & price. But I am super happy with this purchase. I attached pics of my fat self lol just to show real results of this product. I ordered a size Medium.
customer_reviews.author: maigan maisonet

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and the fact I can wear it under a tight dress or top undetected like others I've purchased. Only bad thing is it's a little shorter than I expected,wish it was a little longer for that extra added back support and tummy flattening as I have what they call a muffin top and it flattens but also pushed the extra fat down out the bottom of the shaper right above my panty line.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Rice

customer_reviews.title: It does both and it is comfortable. I bought black
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large. I'm 5'8" and 150 pounds. It fits perfectly. I wanted mine to improve my posture and flatten my stomach under clothes. It does both and it is comfortable. I bought black.
customer_reviews.author: E’smom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium I'm 5"3 and weigh 130 and it fits great I can move comfortably and it doesn't squeeze me too much, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Haisel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Unlike other shapes out there ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Unlike other shapes out there this one will just push the excess fat upwards so that its even more awkward. There's no metal boning so I'm not sure what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Brea

customer_reviews.title: Peter Griffin with cancles.
customer_reviews.text: It's way shorter than it appears. It made me look like Peter Griffin in that one episode where he wears a corset to fit on the roller coaster. Plus there's no shape to it. even if it were longer, I would of just looked like a big cancle.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. I wore it at work the first day, and noticed it kept pulling down, which was embarassing, so I threw it away. I contacted seller, and was told to keep pulling it up. Seller wasn't of any help at all, thought that was rude and would have given better rating if seller offered better recommendation, rather than asking asking me for pictures , or to keep pulling it up. Don't be deceived by model pics. You get what you pay for. I bought Ann cherry, higher quality, and price but worth the money and good customer service , which is very important in business.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia86

customer_reviews.title: Not for long torso people
customer_reviews.text: Too short!!! I have a long torso, so if you constantly have shirts that are too short this product will probably be too short, too. It needs like another 3+ inches to be able to fit like it does in the picture on someone like me. Which is necessary if you have extra skin from weight loss and/or pregnancy. Otherwise it is just super awkward and you either leak from top or bottom or if you position it even worse then that you can have the worst of both worlds and spill from top and bottom. It also bunches up as you move do stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sagura

customer_reviews.title: Totally waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is chep stuff its so worth the price. This is not even a our version of a waist trainer. This holds nothing and your belly still hangs . This is for slim person who just need posture. Im not fat either i weigh 140 and this did nothing for me. No good support !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the support
customer_reviews.text: I like the support, the material is just right for holding my stomach in. It's not to strong and not to giving. Firm!! After wearing it for 24 hours I notice a difference. I waited for 2 days to pass and wore it again for 24 hours. Afterwards I notice that I could adjust the hooks to the next role. Very pleased 😁
customer_reviews.author: EDDIE wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not correct
customer_reviews.text: Size chart is not correct. Order the next size up. After buying this product 2 times and getting the right size, I don't recommend this product. At first I thought the issue with trying to put on and the way the waiste trainer digs into my sides was the size so I hwn purchased the next size up.. to say the least I had the same issues. Not the easiest to put on and digs into my sides less than 30 mins of wearing. I have worn waist trainers before, I had to look for a new product cause the one I wore for years does not get made anymore. I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Beauti-37

customer_reviews.title: A little larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Im familiar with Chinese sizing, but I guess some customers complaining made them change the sizing to reflect the size charts others are more familiar with here in the states. I wish they HAD NOT done that. My waist cincher is too big by about 3 inches. And its the same size SMALL as my other one but THIS one is noticeably larger. The fabric creates rolls that I DONT HAVE without wearing it. LOVE THE product itself but the sizing is off. I naturally have a 25/26" waist.
customer_reviews.author: Chevel A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: As expected... 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: 👍🏽 great buy...gets the job done ✅...I’m 5’7” 160 lbs and ordered the medium...it doesn’t squeeze to to tight...& it’s not lose...it’s tucks in all the right areas...it does not roll dwn & it’s not bulky looking under your clothes!! Now some clothes you wear, yes it may be noticeable that you’re wearing one...but it does not look bulky under your clothes! Very good material/quality...I think you will appreciate this buy!!...
customer_reviews.author: L’z

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" weigh 169, mother of 4 children twin boys, 2 girls, most people can't tell I've had children....anywho this fits perfectly I ordered a 2x can wear it on the first set of clips or the 2nd set, went back to the 1st set don't want to loose the tummy fat too quick only to have a flat saggy(skinned) tummy, I am a security officer and walk alot, this tummy trainer is comfortable for 8 hour wear 5 days a week& I definitely feel I'll get the exact results I desire, in due time. Great price, Great quality, my outer clothes stay dry, yet my tummy areas of concern feel warm, it's working!!🙌
customer_reviews.author: Candise taylor

customer_reviews.title: Starts to hurt after awhile
customer_reviews.text: I just had a baby 3 months ago and needed something to tighten my belly, when I first had it on it was comfortable and I liked it, even got some compliments how I snap back great. I wore it to work and on the 8th hour when I was about to get off, I started to feel pinching, although there are no wire it felt like there was which was poking me and started to feel pain really bad. However I guess after wearing for 8 hours is ok so I give it a 3 star. I would have liked it more if the material has no hard piece inside.
customer_reviews.author: MaRy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a total of 3 waist training and this one being the third one. I have got to say, this is one of the most comfortable one out of it all! I notice that it’s from Hong Kong or basically an Asian product. They tend to run a bit smaller. So I’m 5’4 and 130; but I can pass as a 5’4 and 120lbs. I tend to wear medium so I got a medium. It felt really snug but I can just manage to breathe. And unless the others, this is quite comfortable. No poking from the wires. No itchiness.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Vuong

customer_reviews.title: Lost Inches Quick !
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sucks you in ! I'm 150 lbs postpartum and still had the pouch and wanted to help get rid of it quick . By wearing this a few hours a day and working out a little in it I've lost two inches off my waist in less than a month ! I bought an xl and although it was tough to squeeze into the first few times now I can snap it on like nothing .
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Hylton

customer_reviews.title: Hourglass Figure! Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Good construction and does hold waist in. I drop a dress size when I wear it. Makes waist look like hour glass. I primarily use it as a back brace. Its nice that I look good and not hurt at the same time. I recommend that this product is hand washed gently in cold water. I messed up my first one by putting it in my washing machine in a mesh lingerie bag. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Definetly good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Definetly good for the price.. however I don't wear it long periods of time. When I take it off my stomach kind of hurts due to being pushed in and probably pushing my other organs around. (which these do, do that. I did my research) Despite that though It fits as expected, I am 139 pounds and 5'5'' and I got a large. It is my first one I've ever tried. I wouldn't recommend wearing this hours and hours though. overall good product just not for me I guess! worth a try though if you're curious about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Bones fall out too easily.
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for and it does the job. But it's easily noticable under a tighter shirt (like a plain tank top), especially lighter colored shirts (and I ordered the nude). The little holes may keep you cool, but the "bones" shoot out of their compartments because of the little holes... Would prefer if they weren't removable or were only removable from inside... It's pretty awkward when you have to almost undress to put a "bone" back in the thing... But it has good shaping, and at least on my short torso, it's long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tam Z

customer_reviews.title: Seeing a difference in a week, little by little
customer_reviews.text: Thought the waist trainer would be a little more tighter around my belly button area, but over all only about an inch reduction, thinking I need a small. I am 160 pounds and 5’8, my waist with the trainer is 35.5 inches, I have the Medium on. Update: I decided to keep the waist trainers, I have been wearing them the past week and have been noticing a difference. Really love these
customer_reviews.author: joshua witt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and the fact I can wear it under a tight dress or top undetected like others I've purchased. Only bad thing is it's a little shorter than I expected,wish it was a little longer for that extra added back support and tummy flattening as I have what they call a muffin top and it flattens but also pushed the extra fat down out the bottom of the shaper right above my panty line. Thank you. It is a great deal buy.
customer_reviews.author: all_the_things

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, not as shown in the pic
customer_reviews.text: For staters its much shorter than shown on the picture, either your love handles roll out or your back fat. Too strechy as soon as s you relax your stomach its like you're not even wearing anything. The part where you close it up has thick unflexible material that shows right through your clothes unless you want to wear baggy clothes or very thick sweaters its useless. Dont even bother with this one. Waste of money. I want to know how tall is that model in the picture?? 4 feet tall??? I am 5.4 and it don't cover half the amount shown in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Happyday

customer_reviews.title: Good for wearing underneath clothes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help smooth out my postpartum pooch. I think it does a good job, I posted some before and after pictures so you can see the improvement. This thing is not particularly comfortable, but I’m pretty sure that’s not the point of it. I can wear some of my prepregnacy clothes if I have this on under. For the price I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KatieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing works great makes the tummy look so slimming will be wearing this under my wedding dress in June and will be ordering more !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Short length
customer_reviews.text: I'm 120lbs, 26 waist 37 hip. I was 11 weeks post partum of twins. I can fit my jeans again, but I didn't want to wear them because of my extra skin. I wanted something that just smoothed the extra skin so I could feel comfortable and confident in my clothes again. I probably should have ordered a medium, but I personally prefer a more snug fit so I ordered a small and I'm happy with it. It is movable and breathable. It's a bit short, but I have a short body so it works well for me. I feel comfortable enough to wear this all day every day!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and supportive but doesn't last long!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this while it lasted, and was sad when it broke. It is super comfy and great for working out. The problem is that after a few uses, the hook-and-eye clasps started to bend. They eventually became so bent that it was unwearable. I loved the support this gave, but maybe the best option is to go up a size?
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J.

customer_reviews.title: You get a little more then you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Good buy if your on a budget and need something now. Don’t expect it to last. Good: It covered the front section well, it stayed in place. It did not poke me when it was in the right place. Though at first I tried to have it higher and it did dig into my skin. Bad: It did not cover enough vertically. It is already falling. If not positioned properly it will did into you.
customer_reviews.author: Tony-The-Tech

customer_reviews.title: What do you expect for $9 ?!
customer_reviews.text: First i rated it as 3 stars, but then changed it to 4, because it is very cheap, and it deserves extra star for the low price. The belt is very stretchy, what is good - easy to put it on, and bad - tummy still poking out. it also ralls on sites, what is very annoying. Very comfortable, besides ralling. I wish it would be longer, and i am 5"2" with short torso, so Ladies if you have long torso it is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: O. Bilberry

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: I read one of the reviews that it seemed short, when I got it I could see why because it looked to be short, when I put it on it’s actually not short! I have a very long torso and this fits perfectly, it’s stretchy enough to easily get it on but firm enough that it actually holds without riding up and without steel bars I love it! I am 2 months postpartum and have used many different kinds of trainers in my days, this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This course it is really very good but it's actually trains your midsection more than your waist because it's really not strong enough to pull the waistline in but it compliments your waistline and helps you to hold your stomach in and that's more of what IT addresses is your stomach rather than your waist so I wouldn't call this a waist trainer I would probably call it a Core Trainer because it does IT addresses your entire core thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT waste ur $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Runs super small, had to size up 4x’s my reg. size n it’s not lose, it’s tight but not uncomfortably tight It is a cheap material or it’s sown badly, or u get what y pay for Within a couple of weeks of wearing the material were closure hooks are sown into started to tear DONT waste ur money on this, go to store n try on for ur right size, pay a little more which should get U a better, longer lasting one.
customer_reviews.author: AMBR

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried the product it’s uncomfortable and I wear medium size I bought XL and it hurts and squeezed my top and bottom, it also itches. The hassle to drive to post office or UPS too for a return. I am dissatisfied. No form of help using this. My exercise sweat band works much better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: I like the breathable fabric
customer_reviews.text: I like the breathable fabric, bit it was too short. it barely reaches to above the belt area. The picture advertised shows the corset passing the waist and some of the hips. I wanted a lot more support, as tehepicture showed.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied consumer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly skeptical but I bought this and worn it a week and have lost an Inch from my waist!!! Important to see this as a body shaper it will not make you lose weight but give you more of an hourglass shape
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Very hight waisted, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a light weight back brace for when my sciatica reminds me it's still there and it helps a lot. The only problem I have is that it's very high waisted; however, if I leave the top two-three hooks undone and fold the fabric over, it works just fine. I'm very pleased with this product and its price.
customer_reviews.author: Bijou noir

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 14 shirts, have a 39" ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 14 shirts, have a 39" waist and 46" hips and while it does fit, it has a tendency to buckle. I purchased the XXXL.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but don’t love it. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This waist trainer did not surprise me, I like it but I don’t love it. It is comfortable but the torso is very short as stated before on other reviews. As you can see there’s not too much of a difference when talking about compression and I’m wearing it on the third step, which is the one that’s supposed to give the most compression. What I like is that for loose skin makes you feel everthing is on its place and tight(not super tight) and you can wear it everyday without feeling you are short of breath. I think that for the price is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately too short.
customer_reviews.text: So the idea of this is great but I was very disappointed with how short it was. I got this to help with my stomach after 2 c sections. I heard some so it was short but I’m 5ft tall so I thought it would be fine. However, it would ride up and leave me with a stomach bulge at the bottom. The compression was good and it doesn’t get hot but I can’t really wear it because of the length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go one or two sizes down
customer_reviews.text: This waist trainer is okay for the price. I bought this item to wear postpartum I had my baby a week ago and my waist is 39 inches so I bought XL and I use the most inner hook (smallest setting) it takes away about an 1 1/2 inches, it does not roll down, it is comfortable, and the material is good. I feel like it could be longer and I also feel like I could have purchased a smaller size but as we all know its trial and error with these items
customer_reviews.author: Shannon E.

customer_reviews.title: the flat stomach we deserve
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’3” 150lbs, I got a medium, fits awesome makes my stomach look flat and everything. I’ve got a pretty short torso & idk how this works but i thought the chub would go either up above the waist trainer or below it but surprisingly i did not look like i was spilling out! it was secure and snug. i used the loosest clasp like the directions said to. im super excited i got this great waist trainer at an even greater price! now i can fool people into thinking i’m slim & have my life together ☺️ all while only shelling out $10. awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: It's decent.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat it. It slims slightly and is comfortable. I ordered this trainer mainly to get myself prepared to have something around my waist for when I purchase a legitimate corset eventually. Pros: • Slightly slims • Keeps mostly everything in its place • Material stretches good amount • Slightly breathable Cons: • It's a little on the short side, so some will hang out the top or the bottom if you adjust a little • The material can be a but too flexible at times • Also with the plastic bonding instead of metal, it doesn't keep its shape as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Parker

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, short, and no shape
customer_reviews.text: Corset runs small. I'm usually a large and extra large was a struggle to get one hook on! I finally gave up. I'd say order 1 or 2 sizes up. No shape to it and the item runs short so I'm skeptical how this will give you an hourglass figure. I wanted to like this, but unfortunately it's being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love love love.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It’s comfy. It’s breathable. It does the job. I’m gonna buy a size smaller to see if I can get snatched via my 5’2” frame. At 135lbs the small just makes me look toned. I want the hourglass!!!! It’s so comfy I think I can swing it.
customer_reviews.author: Min.B.Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it!! This waist trainer is amazing. It very flexible and stretchy but will still fit you tight like a waist trainer is supposed to. The waist trainer is comfortable on the skin and body and it’s very lightweight and gets the job done. And for the price, you can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: regine

customer_reviews.title: Could Not Use :(
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed I had to return it because it simply did not fit. I'm usually a medium so I was not expecting it to feel like an extra small. I also did not like how it latches on. I had a waist trainer before and they used velcro instead which was better for adjustments - you can have it as tight or as loose as you wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie F.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a medium and it helps but I should've ordered a small because I can tighten it to the last row and still it sort of feels funny. I normally wear Vanna Belt but for now ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 5'5 and normally I weigh about 165-170 lbs, M/L shirts, and about a size 12 in pants. But I'm naturally smaller than that but I still have a tummy, lol. I ordered a medium and it helps but I should've ordered a small because I can tighten it to the last row and still it sort of feels funny. I normally wear Vanna Belt but for now this will do. It's stretchable and you're able to actually breathe. Took about a week to get to me and I ordered black. I'm on week 2 of wearing it. Hopefully it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about buying this product I say GO FOR IT. It’s very soft on your body and you don’t even feel it’s on. I use it to go for my long walks and it doesn’t make my body feel like I’m overheating but it definitely makes me sweat more. The tiny holes allows you skin to breathe if you just want to wear this throughout the day. I found it so comfy I bought one as a gift for someone. They use it to look slimmer and it can definitely keep you looking slimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard or uncomfortable. Also not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: The word on waist trainers is that they aren’t great and won’t actually change the shape of your body without consequences and serious commitment to wearing one all the time. No thanks. So I have this to tuck in my tummy under clothes and it’s ok. Not super tight but have to remember no shape wear or thing constricting your fat is going to feel amazing. The top does catch your clothes so it’s a little weird to have to be aware if your shirt is pulled down. Still considering returning it and either putting my big butt on a diet or just accepting this new bod.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: but it's good enough. I'm having a little difficulty tightening my ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" and 120 lbs so I ordered a small. I wish it was a little tighter, but it's good enough. I'm having a little difficulty tightening my lower belly after having a c-section and this helps me feel a little like my old self. The one problem I have is the length, which I expected because I have a very short torso. I can still work with it though. One thing I really like is that it cinches my waist in a bit. I have a boyish build, so it gives me some waist definition that I've never had. Overall I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds in the Mom Bod
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to help conceal my "Dunlop" for a formal night. When I opened it and first tried it I was very concerned because it seemed much too small. But due to it's stretchy-ness I was able to hold in my Mom-bod. I might not be able to eat during the meal, but no need for the extra calories here. It's also soft so it doesn't feel like it's cutting into your torso (you already can't breathe, no need to add painful stabbing agony to the mix).
customer_reviews.author: Mjgroomin83

customer_reviews.title: Not quite long enough for me
customer_reviews.text: The product itself looked decently made, but it didnt do much when it came to keeping things in. Im 5’4” and weigh 220lbs. My belly poked out of the bottom and the slight chubbiness in my back poked out of the top. Not that flattering. It also had a bad smell, but that should be easy to reduce. Other than that it did manage to compress some and smooth a little bit. I probably should’ve ordered a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: This is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this brand, it was good for a few days but lost its shape I'm 110lbs and 5' 2" not heavy at all just wanted it to wear as a outfit over close like some people do and it was just not a great quality I should have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lion

customer_reviews.title: high comfort level
customer_reviews.text: I have used waist trainers in the past and one of the reasons I stopped using waist trainers was because of the low comfort level they provide. With this trainer I noticed I can still move normally and wear to the gym without having to stop mid-work out to remove. Definitely recommend if you want to use something comfy that still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: reyna ponce

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Waist Trainer our there! For the people that complained about it pushing your fat up or down, it’s supposed to do that! You purchase this for weight loss reasons so it’s expected that any fat of yours would be pushed up or down until you lose the weight! It will be tough to put on the first few times you use it, but once you’ve worn it and broken it in, it becomes easier. I can wear my clothes with confidence now and don’t have to worry about my belly pudge sticking over the sides of my pants.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: IT FIT FINE
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I was expecting a defective or slightly off product after the reviews I read, however mine finally reach me in AFG. And I have to say it fits quite nice. I have a long torso and I measured after putting it on, it is about 11.5 inches long.from under chest down and 12 inches long the sides. It's not too restricting so it allows you to eat and breathe comfortably. I did inspect it and I seen no manufactured issues as others have experienced, so all in all, I'm happy, and now going to order one in cream/nude tone.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle O.

customer_reviews.title: Not a waist trainer
customer_reviews.text: This corset is nice and will smooth you out, but as far as being a waist trainer I wouldn't recommend the picture it shows is misleading it doesn't pull in and give you that hour glass appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyyy to short for my torso.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I have an average length torso and this was about 4-6 inches too short. Didn't even remotely fit properly. Might have fit around but once I saw how short it was, I didn't even try it the rest of the way on.
customer_reviews.author: karapg

customer_reviews.title: It's great, except..
customer_reviews.text: I really like the waist trainer. It does what it's supposed to, nothing more and nothing less. My waist is 32 in and my love handles are 38 in. I got a size Medium because I wanted it to really suck me in.The only thing keeping me from giving it a 5 star rating is how short the waist trainer is compared to my torso. My torso is average length about 13 inches vertically. The waist trainer however is about 9 inches vertically so it doesn't cover up everything.
customer_reviews.author: SabrinaRosaé

customer_reviews.title: Not the best trainer,  not even a trainer.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't really consider this to be a waist trainer. It supports nothing and has a little too much elasticity. In the picture, it looks as though you're getting maximum coverage as far as height, but when I pulled it out of the package, I was trying to see if if were folded in half. It wasn't. If you're looking for comfort with slight constriction (wear underneath clothing and go out) then this is a good buy. If you're looking to train your waist then keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL

customer_reviews.title: It’s not bad I am pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: It’s not bad I am pleasantly surprised. I got a small which is the normal shirt size I wear. I got it to hide my bloated stomach that happens due to Crohn’s disease. I prob could have used a bigger size I am using the first hooks. But from other reviews medium might be too big. I am wearing it for a few hours today to see how I like it and how comfy it is, I am sitting fine and it is actually helping in my posture as welk.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: but I do like the product
customer_reviews.text: I do wish that it were maybe 1 or 2 inches taller so I agree that it is on the shorter side, but I do like the product. It helps my posture and controls my abs throughout the day. I am 5' 3" 150 lbs and got the large and can only use the largest adjustment so if you are my body size i would go for bigger just in case. If it is too tight the sides can press into your sides and over time it may hurt but it was not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Wong

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run SUPER small
customer_reviews.text: Good product however I would not go off the chart or their recommendations on what size to get. If you got the size that you were expecting when ordered. I’d say they are off by two sizes! If you want a medium order an XL, if you want L order XXL and so on.......
customer_reviews.author: AH92

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because i lost my other one that i had sadly had for years... not sure if i love this because its new and actually tight and awesome like it should be, but it is! I got the small because after all youre waist training! Its not incredibly tight but definately perfect. I put it on right when i recieved it today and it is high quality material, thick and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Own your lbs lbs and be proud
customer_reviews.text: I was gonna return it because it's a little to small (My fault) but I've decided to keep it. It does what it's supposed to do. I give up! I wore it for 3 hours and the bones sticking in my back was painful will be returning it after all. Will be getting a size up because I do like it. Just ordered a 3X, I hope I don't have to return this one too! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Carolyn Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Oooh it umm works..
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! I thought I seen JESUS three times when I wore this!! Oooohhh it will pull in everything including air!! I wouldn’t wear this bare skin(learned the hard way) wear a tank top then put the air snatcher on. Make sure you have a by stander to help you take it off. The five hooks gotten stuck and I thought it was over. I promise you I’ll have a flat stomach in no time wearing this air snatcher!!
customer_reviews.author: Shatika

customer_reviews.title: Way too small don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Looks as pictured. The size chart is not accurate. You’d need to size up by at least 3 sizes in order even get in this corset. Waste of my money, I’ll never fit in it. While “trying” it on the enclosures were ripping out of the seams with the slightest pulling. I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic1122

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, my daughter bought it first and I saw how it was helping her so I decided to get one and it's wonderful but you need to get it at least one size bigger so it can fit better
customer_reviews.author: hermelinda nowak

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. I do not wear this when I exercise, I wear it under dresses and blouses to smooth everything out. AND ITS AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Charlee

customer_reviews.title: Who came up with the sizing chart? It is completely inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and returned this item 3 times now. I followed the sizing chart, and for my last purchase I even went up 2 sizes larger than what the sizing chart suggested and it is STILL too small. I am returning this item for the 3rd time and I will not be purchasing it a 4th time. There are plenty of other waist trainers on the market and this one has already taken up too much of my time and caused me too much frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Waist Trainer Review
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't long enough to me. I am normally a medium in everything, so I bought a medium and figured I could just work my way smaller with the clips. It was WAY too small for me even on the first set of clips, very uncomfortable, and because it wasn't long enough, it was very unflattering. Might would get a larger size and work my way down if it was long enough, but I wont try this one again. You could tell it was made really well and strong though!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittnie P.

customer_reviews.title: ... large according to size and waist chart and fits like a XL /XXL very loose and did not support ...
customer_reviews.text: Item did not fit as expected ordered large according to size and waist chart and fits like a XL /XXL very loose and did not support as described. Seller compared her size and said waist trimmer should fit because hers fits . Item not as described . Seller not cooperative.
customer_reviews.author: W”””

customer_reviews.title: Way too short
customer_reviews.text: Way way way too short for my torso it’s really awful how short it is. I’m 5’9 and it only fit about half my torso it didn’t go down past my belly button it legit only covered the top half of my torso.
customer_reviews.author: megan reddis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this waist trainer. It’s comfortable. And that’s important to me because I do want to be healthy but I also don’t want to feel like I can’t breathe. I put this on whenever I remember. And for the price I’m really happy. It fits over your body and it’s tight enough. I’ve used a few waist trainers in my life and they do actually help your shape a bit.
customer_reviews.author: rienna

customer_reviews.title: No XS?
customer_reviews.text: I received this product over the weekend and am wearing it for the first time this morning. It's breathable and much more comfortable compared to other products I've used, but I wish they had, had the option of an XS as the S is just a bit too big even on the last latch. I'm 5'2" and struggling to lose a bit of a leftover baby pooch and this does a great job at making my clothing fit more smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: A must
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely satisfied with this product. I wear it everyday (8hrs) and it’s very comfortable. I love that you can’t tell that it’s under my clothes. Because I’ve been wearing it so long I’ve started noticing that my body is starting to mold. A definite must in every woman’s wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: missKae

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second waist shaper. Im 5'3" 130lbs I don't like it. 1. Its too short, cuts into my sides. If it was longer like my old different one, it wouldn't have that problem. 2. Its not very sturdy, so it won't shape at all and instead makes me love handles look worse. Will not be buying again. It is breathable though, but still not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Samwolfe

customer_reviews.title: I should have known
customer_reviews.text: It didn't cover as much area as I expected, and I have a short torso, so this REALLY wouldn't work for someone who has a long torso. I just felt like a squeezed in sausage (and I've lost weight). It didn't make me look any thinner. Idk. Just seems like a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Green

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a few years ago, and recently bought another. They are fantastic, and arguably the most comfortable and disguisable waist trainer out there. Better than most shapewear to give me an hourglass silhouette when I need it most. If you handwash, it will last FOREVER. I've had mine 5 years. Pro tip: move the hooks to the back for the best concealment. Even under a bodycon dress you can't tell I'm wearing it if the hooks are in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Morgann

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I was curious to see if these things actually worked compared to some of the photos from other users I took my measurements before and after using it and even bought a size smaller than the chart. It feels tight but it doesn’t do anything. Just keeps your back straight. I checked my measurements after putting it on and they were the exact same. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best trainer in my opinion. I absolutely LOVE this waist trainer. The is my second waist trainer I've purchased and used. My first one was a latex one that I paid a lot of money for. This one I have seen more results and I love that the fabric is breathable. Definitely a must buy if you're in the market for a waist trainer!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent way to start the journey of waist training. I have always wanted to try it out and this is a great product for the price! I am 5'3" and overweight and ordered an XL (these will be snug but that is the point). I feel the product is true to size. Easily hidden under clothes... right now I put on in the morning before work and at lunch, take it off. This allows 4-6 hours with the item on every day. I typically latch all the hooks and slip it on, seems easier that way.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: If i could give it zero stars i would. First of all i normally wear an extra large butbinwas told it runs small so i have to get a 3x (way to make a girl feel fat!) second of all the item fit but it doesnt cover yournentire torso? How stupid and pointless.its over the mid section of my torso and i have fat being squeezed out over the top and my muffin top. NEVER WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 Waist trainer corsets for weight loss sport (small & medium) Since we received our products we put them on immediately and started the workout process. We have been doing speed walking for 2 miles each day and then coming home to sweat it out with just dance 4 on a daily basis for 45 minutes. We like the way it feels and we don't even remember it is there until we get ready to shower. We like the feel and the fact that it is light.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda prieto-williams

customer_reviews.title: Needs some work..
customer_reviews.text: Is breathable... Witch I love but it's to short and it's have your titty fat and back fat oozing over the trainer as if your belly was pushed all the way up and then 💣💥💣💥💣💥 your titty and belly is connect to together.. Needs some work I will oder again after they do some changes... AND THE SELLER WAS AMAZING...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J.

customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It's a little short in my opinion like coverage wise. The fabric on skin can get a bit irritating for my skin. But is that because of the friction or the material idk. If it was a bit longer coverage wise then I would suggest it for like dresses and nights out. If it fits right it may be difficult to get on and ec.. I will be using it multiple times and enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Binder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, and worth the cheap(er) price!
customer_reviews.text: I got mine a couple of days ago (in nude), and I am already seeing some minor results. Wearing a waist trainer can be healthy, but remember that excercise and good diet choices are also important for them to fully work. I'm not lecturing anyone, of course, who just wants to wear them for a little confidence boost! Ladies, these are comfortable, can be hidden under tighter clothing and I loved this brand so much I ordered a second pair (in black)!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Xxxl still too tight
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product to help with postpartum abdominal diastasis. This is a good product, but it can be a tad uncomfortable to wear. I ordered size xxxl and it is still pretty snug and kind of hard to put on. It is durable though, and I bet if I lost a bit of weight it wouldn't be too tight or uncomfortable. It does have like wires in it that can dig into you when sitting...so be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Night Fox

customer_reviews.title: Little small, mostly great
customer_reviews.text: I have recently gained quite a lot of weight on a new medication and got this to try and fit into some of my old clothes again. I got a 3XL for a 38 waist and it's a little small but still workable. Otherwise very comfortable and worth the money. I hope to fit into it better once I drop a few pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I feel like my organs are moving, but got the job done
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for when my job required me to look like I slim down. It worked pretty well for my job, but came to be pretty uncomfortable for the most part. But it got done what needed to be done
customer_reviews.author: Liana Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: It’s not long enough it’s to short I usually wear M-L in clothes so I bought an XL and it was too small, way to small then I ordered a 3XL which is the biggest size they offer and its still to small it makes more fat come out the top from trying to squeeze into it then it wants to fold down on the top because of the fat coming out of the top. Doesn’t look like anything in the picture, needs to be longer and maybe bigger sizes there’s no way this 3XL is a 3XL
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Flores

customer_reviews.title: It's not terrible, but it's not the best for actual waist ...
customer_reviews.text: The bodice is quite short. It's about 9" long. It is made of an athletic breathable/highly flexible mesh. However, there are only 4 bones in it, which is not enough to truly create support and structure in such a soft fabric. It's not terrible, but it's not the best for actual waist training; it's okay as a simple waist cincher, though it constantly rolls. If it was a couple inches longer and had double the boning, this would be an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: As for the design, It’s a little short in ...
customer_reviews.text: As for the design, It’s a little short in the torso, if it was two inches longer it would be okay. As for the actual sizing, I’m a size 12/14 or 36/38 and I ordered a xxl thinking that would be big enough for me but i should have actually ordered more of a xxxxl loollllll. Oh well, I can wear this with another longer trainer I have for working out/compression
customer_reviews.author: naz

customer_reviews.title: Sad day.
customer_reviews.text: This is too thin/not sturdy enough to do what it says it does. Perhaps over clothes it would work better, but that’s not what it’s for. Sides aren’t strong enough to hold everything in. This creates more bulges. Larger size would create less bulges I’m sure, but wouldn’t cinch as much. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J

customer_reviews.title: Its very comfortable and i can work out in it or just ...
customer_reviews.text: Im 5'4 and 155 lbs, i have a smaller waistline but got a large due to sizing saying that dress size is 8-10 equals a large. It fits perfectly i xan make it tighter or looser. Its very comfortable and i can work out in it or just chill out around the house and take care of my little one. It helps support my stomach and back and is very breathable! I would buy again or recomend this to any mother who needs post partum stomach assistance, my stomach hasnt hurt since using it! I can go on linger walks without getting nausious!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Larson

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to put on and take off - itchy
customer_reviews.text: Itchy for long periods. Better to use a shell or camisole underneath. The fasteners show through any blouse or dress. Requires thick top like a sweater to smooth out the fasteners. Not a permanent solution. Velcro is more adjustable and can get tighter for a longer lasting effect after it's off.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving it! I have noticed a change. The only thing i would like to recommend is that be a bit longer. I know its meant for waists but i feel like it should start from around the hip to help mold those with “muffin tops” and fit right underneath the bra to avoid that extra “roll” between the bra where the trainer ends. For the price it is excellent! I love that it is almost invisible under clothing
customer_reviews.author: yalithza lopez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 350 lbs (it’s a very embarrassing weight, surely) strapped this around my waist and instantly people were asking me how I lost 100 lbs so quickly!! On top of that my dream girl, Pattie McFlowers, finally looked at me after this....Well, maybe it was because it was so tight of a bind it flung apart and smacked a coworker in the back of the neck.....Either way, awesome buy!! Buying 5 more to reinforce my pot belly this time!
customer_reviews.author: Lookin4DaCheapShi¥

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the bucks!
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be way more comfortable than the others that I have purchased in the past, especially for the price. It fits well beneath my clothing, and also helps me to refrain from overeating. The only minor thing that I found was that it starts to slide after wearing it all day. I would suggest wearing a camisole or undershirt before putting it on, that way it doesnt slide because of the sweat. I will definitely be ordering another product soon. Great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: RAINA CUNNINGHAM

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: The product fits as expected around my waist, but the length is at least an inch and a half shorter than it stated in the details. So its either too high and makes a weird bulge at my hips, or too low and sits at an uncomfortable spot on my ribs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

product_meta.title: Waist Trainer Corset for Weight Loss Sport Workout Body Shaper Tummy Fat Burner
feature_bullets: MESH CORSET: Mesh Body Shaper Corset are made with breathable mesh, can be worn under clothes. Breathable & stretchy mesh Waist Trainer, Suitable for many sports and everyday wear.

SIZE CHART --- Please refer to the correct SIZE CHART we provided instead of Amazon Size Chart. If the size is between two sizes, the shape effect of the small size is stronger, but it feels tighter when it is first worn, and the larger size is relatively comfortable to wear.

PREMIUM MATERIAL --- Our waist trimmer is made of quality Nylon/Spandex soft fabrics with mesh & elasticity, which are elastic,stretchable,breathable and comfortable to wear. It's also can be worn under everyday clothes,which keeps you comfortable while you are shaping.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL WAIST TRAINER --- With four pieces built-in steel bones to ensure the body shape is kept in in best posture, not only effectively control & flattens the stomach, but also provides enough support for back pain relief and correct your posture and it will not easy rolled.3 rows of hooks eyes design providing different level of compression of tummy control, allowing you to adjust size as necessary.

TUMMY CONTROL COMPRESSION SHAPEWEAR FOR ANY OCCASION --- Widely used in body-building exercises, such as exercising, running, yoga or going out, but also Ideal for providing compression and support for postpartum recovery or lose weight,abdominal strains,tummy trainer.
